name: BostonGuide
0:
”Alexa, open Boston Guide”
”Alexa, ask Boston Guide for the top five things to do”
”Alexa, ask Boston Guide to tell me about Boston”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boston guide
des:
Whether you're visiting Boston for the first time or want to be a tourist in your own city, use this guide to learn about Boston, find what to do, and hear local news headlines.

Some things you can say:
"Alexa, open Boston Guide",
"Alexa, ask Boston Guide for the top five things to do",
"Alexa, ask Boston Guide to tell me about Boston",
"Alexa, ask Boston Guide for the local news",
"Alexa, ask Boston Guide where I should go"

Enjoy Boston!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
